entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
